item.title: Pimco 债券主管称特朗普将为美联储主席做出正统选择
item.description: 全球最大的债券管理公司之一表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在挑选下一任美联储主席时可能会墨守成规。【原文：US President Donald Trump is likely to stick with convention when he picks the next Federal Reserve Chair, according to one of the world’s biggest bond managers.】

item.title: 加密货币金融公司蜂拥华尔街，掀起 SPAC 和合并热潮
item.description: 随着企业家们利用空白支票公司和反向兼并将其持有的数字资产上市，一场数十亿美元的资本市场实验正在华尔街展开。【原文：A multibillion-dollar capital markets experiment is unfolding on Wall Street, as entrepreneurs use blank-check companies and reverse mergers to take their holdings of digital assets public.】

item.title: 墨丘利与赞比亚在新伙伴关系下运送首批铜矿
item.description: 摩科瑞能源集团（Mercuria Energy Group）和赞比亚一家国有企业在获得政府批准出口半加工铜金属后，将根据新的贸易伙伴关系发运首批铜。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group and a Zambian state-owned company are set to ship their first copper under a new trading partnership after obtaining a government waiver to export a semi-processed form of the metal.】

item.title: 微软投资者质疑公司与以色列军方合作
item.description: 一群微软公司的投资者正在向该公司施压，要求其评估如何有效识别滥用其人工智能工具的客户。【原文：A group of Microsoft Corp. investors is pressuring the company to assess how effectively it identifies customers who misuse its artificial intelligence tools, a push that follows reports detailing the Israeli military’s use of Microsoft software during its war in Gaza.】

item.title: 特朗普将巴西拖入贸易战，巴西多头岿然不动
item.description: 从安本集团（Aberdeen Group Plc）到富兰克林邓普顿（Franklin Templeton）的基金经理们都继续看好巴西，押注该国将经受住唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）贸易战震中的意外转变。【原文：Money managers from Aberdeen Group Plc to Franklin Templeton are staying bullish on Brazil, betting the country will withstand its unexpected turn in the epicenter of Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 标准银行称关税动荡掩盖了南非的经济复苏
item.description: 标准银行集团有限公司（Standard Bank Group Ltd.）表示，美国最近一波关税行动造成的混乱可能会掩盖南非经济复苏的早期迹象。【原文：The chaos wrought by a recent wave of US tariff actions may be obscuring early signs of recovery in South Africa’s economy, Standard Bank Group Ltd. said.】

item.title: 关税担忧再次困扰交易商，S&P 指数从纪录回落
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将贸易斗争升级，威胁对部分加拿大商品征收 35% 的关税，并提出可能对大多数其他国家增加征税，美国股市周五开盘暴跌。【原文：US equities tumbled at the open on Friday, as President Donald Trump escalated his trade fight, threatening a 35% tariff on some Canadian goods and floating the possibility of increasing levies on most other countries.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行（CIBC）称，特朗普对加拿大征收的关税并未计入市场价格
item.description: 据加拿大帝国商业银行资本市场部（CIBC Capital Markets）称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与加拿大贸易争端的最新一击可能会打击相对较少的商品，但北美股市并未充分认识到这一风险。【原文：The latest salvo in US President Donald Trump’s trade dispute with Canada may hit a relatively small pool of goods, but North American stock markets aren’t fully appreciating the risk, according to CIBC Capital Markets.】

item.title: 斯塔达为 9 月首次公开募股恢复投资者会议
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Stada Arzneimittel AG 公司已恢复为其首次公开募股与投资者会面，并可能最快于 9 月份试水艰难的首次股票销售市场。【原文：Stada Arzneimittel AG has resumed meeting investors for its initial public offering and could test a difficult first-time share sale market as soon as September, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中东冲突是全球化肥供应面临的最新威胁
item.description: 中东最近的紧张局势再次提醒人们，来自这一动荡地区的重要化肥供应面临风险。【原文：Recent tensions in the Middle East are the latest reminder of the risks to crucial fertilizer supplies from the embattled region.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易战促使一些加拿大人对美股态度转冷
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战，加拿大人一直在回避美国产品。现在有证据表明，一些人也希望在他们的退休账户和养老基金中看到更少的美国股票。【原文：Canadians have been shunning US products as a result of President Donald Trump’s trade war. Now there’s evidence some also want to see fewer US stocks in their retirement accounts and pensions funds.】

item.title: 私人信贷吸引坐拥 3.1 万亿美元的超级富豪
item.description: 在本周于伦敦举行的一次以超级富豪为主题的私人市场会议上，这个一向谨慎的行业对私人信贷的兴趣与日俱增。【原文：At a private markets conference focused on the ultra-rich in London this week, the typically discreet sector was notably candid about its growing interest in private credit.】

item.title: 德国钢铁制造商沙士基达成国防股焦点
item.description: 本周，一家德国钢铁制造商的一种产品获准用于军事目的，成为最新一只受益于欧洲国防开支激增的股票。【原文：A German steelmaker became the latest stock to benefit from a surge in European defense spending this week after getting the go-ahead for one of its products to be used for military purposes.】

item.title: 穆迪上调评级后阿曼违约风险降至历史最低点
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将阿曼政府评级提升至投资级后，阿曼政府债务违约保险成本降至历史最低点。该国债券大涨。【原文：The cost of default insurance on Oman’s government debt fell to a record low after Moody’s Ratings upgraded the government to investment grade. The country’s bonds rallied.】

item.title: 路易威登英国公司称黑客窃取了部分客户数据
item.description: 路易威登英国公司称，黑客窃取了一些客户数据，该奢侈品牌成为一连串针对零售商的网络攻击的最新目标。【原文：Louis Vuitton UK said hackers have stolen some customer data as the luxury brand becomes the latest target in a string of cyberattacks against retailers.】

item.title: 国际清算银行称稳定币增长为监管机构带来新风险
item.description: 国际清算银行警告说，稳定币（通常与法定货币挂钩的数字代币）的迅速扩张正在给金融当局带来新的政策挑战，有可能使关键市场的货币主权受到威胁。【原文：The Bank for International Settlements warned that the rapid expansion of stablecoins — digital tokens usually pegged to fiat currencies — is creating new policy challenges for financial authorities, potentially placing monetary sovereignty in key markets under threat.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯刚刚成为欧佩克最新的骗子
item.description:
国际能源机构称，沙特每天的产量超出配额约 70 万桶。【原文：

The International Energy Agency says the kingdom exceeded its output quota by about 700,000 barrels a day.

】

item.title: 加拿大意外增加 8.31 万个工作岗位，创 2025 年最大增幅
item.description: 加拿大经济摆脱了关税的不确定性，新增就业人数为六个月来最多，失业率自一月份以来首次下降。【原文：The Canadian economy shrugged of tariff uncertainty and added the largest number of jobs in six months, with unemployment rate falling for the first time since January.】

item.title: 印度将从国家储备中出售更多碎米以减少库存
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度正在考虑一项建议，即扩大从国家库存中向公开市场出售碎米的范围，此举可能会增加用于出口和乙醇生产的谷物供应。【原文：India is considering a proposal to expand the sale of broken rice from state stockpiles into the open market, according to people familiar with the matter, a move that may boost supplies of the grain for exports and ethanol production.】

item.title: 沙特要求欧佩克观察家修改数据以保持在配额内
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯正在要求欧佩克用于独立分析石油产量水平的公司提交一个较低的沙特 6 月份产量数字。【原文：Saudi Arabia is asking the companies that OPEC uses for independent analysis of oil-production levels to submit a lower figure for the kingdom’s June output, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚在交易所开业六个月后首次进行股票交易
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚新成立的交易所开始与两家上市贷款机构（Wegagen Bank SC 和 Gadaa Bank SC）以及一些政府证券进行股票交易。【原文：Ethiopia’s nascent exchange commenced equities trading with two listed lenders, Wegagen Bank SC and Gadaa Bank SC, and some government securities.】

item.title: 俄罗斯煤炭行业陷入危机显示经济出现裂痕
item.description: 在高额借贷成本和制裁的重压下，俄罗斯的煤炭行业已陷入危机，中国需求放缓加上价格下跌，暴露出更深的经济裂缝。【原文：Russia’s coal industry has slipped into crisis under the weight of high borrowing costs and sanctions as slowing demand in China compounds with falling prices to expose deeper cracks in the economy.】

item.title: Prime Day 购物者在亚马逊和竞争对手中寻找最优惠价格
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，斯宾塞-索珀（Spencer Soper）将报道我们可以从亚马逊 Prime Day 促销活动的早期购买中解读出什么。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Spencer Soper reports on what we can interpret from the early purchases during Amazon’s Prime Day sales event.】

item.title: 美国似乎无法摆脱对中国工厂的依赖
item.description: 我是驻香港的亚洲经济记者 Katia Dmitrieva。今天我们关注中国对全球供应链的控制。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Katia Dmitrieva, Asia economics correspondent in Hong Kong. Today we’re looking at China’s hold over global supply chains. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普税法有望刺激美国工厂投资，但关税带来风险
item.description: 美国制造商在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的预算大法案中获得了他们所希望的商业税收条款，但总统反复无常的贸易政策有可能削弱资本投资的明显回升。【原文：US manufacturers secured the business tax provisions they’d hoped for in Donald Trump’s budget megabill, but the president’s erratic trade policy risks tempering any pronounced pickup in capital investment.】

item.title: 为兰特和雷亚尔下跌进行套期保值的成本因关税危险而飙升
item.description: 南非兰特和巴西雷亚尔的波动说明了交易商在评估美国关税潜在影响时所面临的复杂性。【原文：The gyrations of South Africa’s rand and Brazil’s real illustrate the complexities traders face in evaluating the potential impact of US tariffs.】

item.title: 非洲结束十年债务困扰，莫桑比克利差下降
item.description: 十年来首次没有一个非洲国家的主权风险溢价处于困境。【原文：For the first time in a decade, no African country has a sovereign risk premium in distress territory.】

item.title: 花旗银行曼特希认为明年全球股市涨势将放缓
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Gains in global equities will slow over the coming 12 months, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists, who said earnings expectations appear relatively optimistic given the “highly uncertain” outlook.】

item.title: 关税头条滚动，"守夜人 "不见踪影
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 06:19。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 06:19 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 比特币突破 118,000 美元，多头称反弹条件成熟
item.description: 面对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的新一轮关税攻势，股票市场摇摆不定，而比特币多头则在为新一轮反弹做准备。【原文：As equities markets wobble in the face of a fresh tariff onslaught from US President Donald Trump, Bitcoin bulls are positioning for a fresh rally.】
